modules.description: Validates records by combining individual sub-validators that check specific fields. Works with OCaml records and custom types, applying constraints like presence, type, and value ranges. Used to enforce data integrity in form submissions and configuration parsing.

This module performs type-safe, composable validation to transform input records into strictly structured outputs, applying checks like non-empty strings, email format, and minimum age constraints. It operates on input records containing optional fields and integers, using chained validators to enforce requirements and generate error messages. Use cases include form validation scenarios where data integrity is critical, such as user registration or data entry workflows.
